set.name: DMR-19 Forbidden Dokindam X: Forbidden Edition

property.name: Type
property.value: Forbidden Impulse

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ At the start of the game, include this card into the 5 cards in your hand. ■ This impulse is put into the battle zone with 4 seals on it. ■ Forbidden Liberate—When this impulse has no seals on it, flip it to its creature side. {SEAL} (To seal a card, put the top card of your deck on top of that card face down. Whenever a Command is put, its owner puts a seal from one of their cards that has the same civilization as that Command into their graveyard. Sealed creatures are ignored.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DMR-19 Forbidden Dokindam X: Forbidden Edition

property.name: Type
property.value: Forbidden Creature

property.name: Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When this creature Forbidden Liberates, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 6666 or less. ■ When this creature leaves the battle zone, your opponent chooses one of your shields. Put that shield into your graveyard. ■ If this creature is anywhere other than the hand or battle zone, put it into your graveyard.

property.name: Set

property.name: Type
property.value: Forbidden Creature

property.name: Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When this creature Forbidden Liberates, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 6666 or less. ■ When this creature leaves the battle zone, your opponent chooses one of your shields. Put that shield into your graveyard. ■ If this creature is anywhere other than the hand or battle zone, put it into your graveyard.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMR-19 Forbidden Dokindam X: Forbidden Edition

property.name: Type
property.value: Evolution Creature

property.name: Race
property.value: Sonic Command/Invader

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your fire creatures. {INVASION}-Fire command (When one of your Fire command attacks, you may put this creature from your hand onto it.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When this creature is destroyed, you may put one of the cards that was under it from your graveyard into the battle zone.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMR-19 Forbidden Dokindam X: Forbidden Edition

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 9999 or less. ■ Put one of your seals into your graveyard.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMR-19 Forbidden Dokindam X: Forbidden Edition

property.name: Race
property.value: Human Baku/Invader/Initials

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, put one of your seals from the battle zone into your graveyard.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMR-19 Forbidden Dokindam X: Forbidden Edition

property.name: Race
property.value: Sonic Command/Invader/Initials

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Ultra Saver—Creature that has "Dokindam" in its name (When one of your creatures that has "Dokindam" in its name would leave the battle zone, you may destroy this creature instead.)
